completion_promises.criterion_text: Three patterns documented with when-to-use guidance

Each pattern includes When to use list, hierarchy example, and creation command. Added Pattern Selection Guidance comparison table. Validated by TestPatternDocumentation (6 tests) and TestAllPatternsComplete (3 tests).

Also documented in Process step 3 (line 126) that validation includes organisation_pattern value checking.
